title: Some progress on inequality and climate change in Lima amid tax disappointment (Oxfam International)
text: ( Source : Oxfam International ) At the Annual Meetings of the World Bank and the IMF in Peru this week, moves to help combat inequality and climate change were announced, but G20 finance ministers failed to adequately address the skewed
